sense.def: Pathological Condition not mentioned in any other medical text. Possibly a writing error for nai xuan 奶癬 , breast- xuan -illness, as feng xiang 楓香 was often used for treating breast- xuan -illness during the Yuan and Ming era. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry feng xiang zhi 楓 香脂 quotes Huo you quan shu 活幼全書 : 小兒奶疽：生面上，用楓香為膏，攤貼之 , “ Children’s breast-feeding impediment-illness : when it grows on the face prepare a paste from feng xiang and apply externally”.
